channel.title: Solar Technology on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Solar Technology on FinanClub

item.title: CX
item.description: score:1041 Chances: Cemex and Synhelion’s joint effort to develop fully solar-driven cement production represents a significant milestone, potentially revolutionizing the energy-intensive cement manufacturing process. Double-digit price hikes and a strong peso have contributed to Cemex’s rise in net profit and revenue in the second quarter, demonstrating positive financial performance.
